Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 352.
Subjects: carols, of the Innocents; Holy Innocents, feast of
_description: A macaronic carol for Innocents’ Day — three 5-line stanzas (ababa) with refrain word, ‘milicia’, and 2-line burden: ‘Sonet laus per secula./ Innocentum gloria’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Dic erodes impiewhat awayleth thy
                    cruellis…
